Great game, at first it seems simple, but the better you get, the better the killers are, and the more and more you get to understand all the intricacies of the game. Not the greatest balancing in the gaming industry, but fair enough.
トリクスーが強すぎてやる人がいなくなる

Jogo muito bom, acho um jogo bem divertido pra focar em ficar bom e passar o tempo, o único ponto ruim é que se vc quiser jogar com uma variedade de survivors e killer você tem que pagar um preço consideravelmente caro (fora da promoção). Tirando isso, o jogo é bem divertido, matchmaking é justo (depois da atualização que teve) e da pra upar mesmo sem nenhuma dlc. Gostei :D
The game is beatiful, it's mechanics are great. The gameplay is such wonderfull and tense becouse you don't know were the killer is. I recommend the game, it is giving me hours of fun.
Game is okay but I've encountered lots of crashes especially when there were updates.

Давайте начнём с того, что если Вы собираетесь покупать эту игру, то прошу приготовиться к незабываемому полёту на орбиту. 
Ежедневно и ежечасно Ваша жопа будет полыхать то от кэмперов\туннелеров\фейскемперов\уродов, которые играют от пола, то от долбоебов в Вашей тиме, при подборе которых ДБД нарыграет Вам в рот, и в руки, и в лицо, не волнует Ваш ранг, скилл. 3 ранг? Ну, замечательно, поиграй-ка с кучкой мусора, которые сидят в шкафах, сидят всю игру в приседе, не могут скинуть доску, не умеют пользоваться фонариком и тд. Больше всего меня радуют хиты в этой ебучей игре, уже перепрыгнул через доску? Лови хит когда ты уже убежал от мана. Чего-чего, чел снял тебя и Вы хотите вдвоем убежать? Смешной, вот твой друг долбоеб стопит и себя, и тебя.
В целом неплохо, бывают и очень адекватные маны и сурвы, тогда играть одно удовольствие.
Короче, 9/10.
still no sexy ladies. no good

Only 20 hours on PC but over 1500 hours on Playstation, the core and premise of this game are phenomenal and in the many years i've played this game, i've overall had a very positive experience with it. The only downside to the game are some of the players (which unfortunately the developers cant help). The quality of matches you play are ultimately up to the player who plays as the killer and when you constantly get players who deliberately try and ruin the game match after match, it can tire you down very quickly (as a survivor). As a survivor I would highly suggest playing with friends and not playing solo queue for a better experience too.

That aside, the game now (as opposed to when it was released) is much more fleshed out, with rifts (much like your battle passes) which reward players who completed the specific challenges with cosmetics and in-game currency (auric cells). This keeps the game interesting and gives you something else to strive for during these events (and after the events have ended if you don't mind missing the cosmetics). There are so many killers and survivors to play as now as well, which means matches are getting a little more diverse than they used to be with more content constantly being released in future (hello Resident Evil very soon!).

I do highly recommend this game to anyone who enjoys online multiplayer games, the game is only getting better, it's a shame that some players choose to ruin it for others.
